meanings.definition: A strip of material encircling the waist, especially on a garment.
meanings.sent1: She adjusted her waistband before heading out for a walk.
meanings.sent2: The pants had a comfortable elastic waistband.
meanings.sent3: The waistband of the skirt rebelled and refused to stay in place.
meanings.sent4: His loyalty was a waistband holding the team together.
meanings.sent5: The bright red waistband contrasted beautifully with the dark dress.

meanings.definition: The part of a garment that encircles the waist.
meanings.sent1: He tugged at the waistband of his jeans to make them fit better.
meanings.sent2: The dress had a delicate lace waistband.
meanings.sent3: The waistband of the shorts decided to take a break and slid down comically.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the waistband that completed her outfit.
meanings.sent5: The waistband of the robe was embroidered with intricate patterns.
